kitty_shines: Im a amateur photographer.....there takes place a religious parade during holi in Kolkata, by a prestigious community. Trying to touch your breats in the group or come close enough to press your dick from behind....it was so blurry becaause they kept throwing colors in abundance...we could hardly see.....I was disgusted and it was so hard to do my job. Two things that are heavily assaulted during holi are Women and cameras. That day when i came home i felt so terrible, spoke to my friend and asked her is it a crime for women to want to be photographers and do street photography. Was doing my job. Would mention i did push the assaulter hard but i was worried that my camera would be damaged if i did more....
